Name: Biglands: A Game Made By Kids
About the game: Embark on an epic adventure through unknown lands on a quest to save the world! Fight your way through hordes of enemies! Navigate through perilous obstacles! Collect tons of items! Build and upgrade your weapons! Prepare for monstrous bosses! All from the imagination and creativity of kids! ** Play with a GAME CONTROLLER, TOUCHSCREEN controls, or KEYBOARD and MOUSE ** This game is a gift to my nephews. They came up with the name, story and gameplay. The characters, weapons, enemies, bosses, fonts, some levels and many other miscellaneous objects were collected from their old drawings, which can be viewed by collecting the concept art throughout the game.
